level.text: The CPO may procure goods or services through a General Services Administration schedule pursuant to 40 U.S.C. § 502(a)(3) and 40 U.S.C. § 602(c).
The CPO shall ensure that the price of any contract entered into under subsection (a) of this section is reasonable.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-371
level.text: For history of Law 18-371, see notes under § 2-351.01.
